Analyte(s): IgA antibodies against deamidated gliadin peptide
IgG antibodies against deamidated gliadin peptide
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Grifols α-Gliatest and α-GliaPep ELISA assays for detection of anti-gliadin and anti-deamidated gliadin peptide antibodies in serum to aid in celiac disease diagnosis
Indications for Use Summary: Semi-quantitative determination of IgA or IgG antibodies against gliadin or deamidated gliadin peptide in human serum, as an aid in the diagnosis of celiac disease, used in conjunction with other serological tests and clinical findings.
